title: [K-12] Blended Learning Design for Evaluating the Effectiveness of Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Social Science Theory and Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Evaluating the effectiveness of remote education through project-based learning on social sector topics in a digital device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners utilize self-regulated learning strategies at a frequency of 80% or higher in blended learning environments
Learners complete project deliverables while utilizing web-based tools (collaboration platforms, data analysis tools, etc.) three or more times per week
Learners can analyze a remote education effectiveness evaluation model with 90% accuracy based on feedback on the lecture design process.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
